slides.title: Become a tree owner and help fight climate change!
slides.description: Plant trees, track their growth and get 100% of the profit from the sustainable timber, all while contributing to a greener future.

slides.title: Take some environmental action now
slides.description: After a simple assessment, you can earn points by doing some small environmental protection activities that can be started right away!

slides.title: Protect the Earth with Children
slides.description: For the future of our planet, let's act together with our children
